welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Towcester, UK! Known for its rich history and bustling markets, we invite you to explore our quaint town and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
